name: 3 PM Flat Belly
description: Slim waistlines are all about maintaining wellness, achieving moderation, curbing cravings, and staying active. When you're thinking thin, deliciously mouthwatering 3 PM Flat Belly is perfect for you—caffeine-free with no calories, sweeteners, or flavorings. The fluid balancing of hibiscus helps keep things flowing, while peppermint is thought to be a craving crusher, and fennel helps with bloating. Fennel seeds and licorice root also impart a natural sweetness, satisfying any afternoon urge to splurge. This gentle herbal indulgence has a full body flavor that not only makes you feel thin, but inspires you to get into those skinny jeans.

name: 9 PM Stress Buster
description: Nurture your health and wellness by soothing your senses with this naturally calming blend of flavorful aromatic herbs. Health-promoting red rooibos provides the dark red base, with a naturally sweet, creamy taste and aroma. The health benefits of rooibos are many; it is full of antioxidants and healthy minerals. Valerian root is one of nature’s sedatives, promoting rest and relaxation since ancient Greek & Roman times. 9 PM Stress Buster combines herbs, fruit, and flowers to deliver some dreamy satisfaction.

name: Blood Orange Smoothie
description: This award-winning blend of naturally caffeine–free South African red rooibos, orange, and creamy vanilla is herbal bliss! This herbal tea combines rooibos, orange peel, hibiscus, rosehips, apples, safflowers, rose petals, vanilla, and citrus flavors. It brews into a dark red liquor with a naturally sweet, creamy taste and aroma, reminiscent of orange creamsicles and Orange Julius smoothies! Kids and adults both love this herbal tea, making it a great substitute for sugary juices and sodas, with no lack of flavor or thirst-quenching satisfaction. The health benefits of rooibos are numerous; it is full of antioxidants and healthy minerals such as calcium, potassium, magnesium, iron, zinc, copper, and fluoride.
features: A natural source of antioxidants & minerals

name: Chamomile Tea
description: This timeless herbal tea consists of simply gorgeous chamomile flowers. This naturally caffeine-free tea is an excellent refresher, with soothing and calming effects, making it the perfect nightcap. The light golden brew has a soothing aroma and light sweet taste. It even makes a refreshing thirst quencher when served as iced tea.

name: Coconut Crush Chai
description: Enjoy a blissful crush on coconut from our creative twist on traditional chai. This craft blend brings together the beauty and warmth of South African Rooibos with swirling aromas, for a deliciously intriguing cup of herbal chai. Sweet Indian spices will enchant you from your first sip of this delicate treasure, followed by a burst of creamy toasted coconut. Amazing hot, iced or as a naturally sweet and calming herbal latte, your crush will get deeper with every cup.

name: Cold Buster with Tulsi
description: Back in time for cold & flu season, is our caffeine-free immunity blend to relieve stress and promote health. Our Cold Buster with Tulsi Leaf, aka holy basil, is based on a recipe for a natural cold cure from Europe. This rooibos-based tea is packed with an array of healthy constituents to help warm and fortify you from inside. High in Vitamin C, with lemon and orange peel, hibiscus and rose hips, it also contains herbs and Tulsi to soothe cold symptoms and control coughs.

name: Cold Infusions Chill Out, Organic
description: Cold Infusions are organic single-serving cold brew tea packs that pair with our Steep & Go filter and Cold Brew Bottle to make fresh brewed tea on-the-go. Each pack makes up to 24 oz of tea. Simply cold brew for 10-15 minutes in chilled or room temperature water.

name: Detox, Organic
description: Enjoy the effects of botanical ingredients like Sage, Lemon Balm, Lemongrass and Lemon Peel for a soothing natural cleanse. Your body is constantly being challenged by everyday toxins like alcohol, smoke, food additives, and stress. The delicate balance of citrus and sage make “Detox” prepare your body for healthful cleansing in a most delicious way. Every cup will leave you feeling naturally refreshed as you stimulate your body’s immune system.

name: Ginger Tea, Organic
description: Plump bits of dried ginger root steep into a strikingly spicy and aromatic caffeine-free brew. We find it especially delicious with fresh lemon and honey, as well as cold brewed. Ginger tea is a great source of Vitamin C and magnesium and has been consumed for centuries to help with stomach cramps, motion sickness, nausea, and respiratory problems, and is often used to relieve stress thanks to its strong, relaxing aroma. Just taking a whiff of this warming infusion will leave you feeling calm and refreshed.

name: Gingerbread Cookie
description: Spicy like gingersnaps with an exquisite hint of honey, this red rooibos herbal will make you think that fresh baked cookies have just come out of the oven! Rich with cinnamon and ginger, this hearty blend is one you'll want to savor. Naturally caffeine-free and naturally high in antioxidants and minerals, make this rooibos based tea part of your healthy habits this season. This guilt-free decadence is warm, welcoming, and to be enjoyed any time of day or night.
